plot_size_comment: DO NOT MOD!:  currently supported size is 2=2X1 4=2X2 and 5= 1 wide with 2x2 under
file_mod_comment: DO NOT MOD!:  adds description to file name.  file name = scenarios_model_copc_file_mod.png
title_line_1_comment: DO NOT CHANGE COMMENTS!: first line of the title.  {0} will be changed to the match each row of key_data1
title_line_2_comment: DO NOT CHANGE COMMENTS!: second line of the title.  {0} will be changed to the match each row of key_data1
title_line_3_comment: DO NOT MOD!:  line 3 of figure title
plot_sql_comment: DO NOT MOD!:  plot sql is the sql to pull data from the database
plot_sql: select * from (select t.copc as data_key1, T.mdl_id as data_key2, T.shp_file_id as plot_id, T.year, T.max, T.p95,T.p90, T.p75, T.p50, a.unit_out as unit, a.mcl from mv_concentrations_masked_timeseries T, mv_analytes A, shapefiles S where T.mdl_id in (9,11,12,14,15,16) and A.mdl_id = T.mdl_id and A.analyte = T.copc and T.shp_file_id = S.shp_file_id union all select T.copc, T.mdl_id as file_id, 0 as plot_id, T.year,T.max,T.p95, T.p90, T.p75, T.p50, A.unit_out as unit, A.mcl from mv_concentrations_global_timeseries_neil T, mv_analytes A where t.mdl_id in (9,11,12,14,15,16) and A.mdl_id = T.mdl_id and A.analyte = T.copc) a
key_cols_comment: DO NOT MOD!:  Should never change, would require code changes
exclude_cols_comment: DO NOT CHANGE COMMENTS!:  Columns That are not used in the Graphs/plots but need to be in the CSV data file.
data_def_comments: DO NOT CHANGE COMMENTS!: this defines the line color/style to use when ploting the data column [index of line_color, index of line_style]
restrict_keys_comments: DO NOT CHANGE COMMENTS!: Restricts data_key1 to specific values
plot_order_comment: DO NOT MOD!:  plot_id order to put the plots in, starting at top, left to right
start_year_comment: DO NOT MOD!:  year the x axis starts on.  All graphs generated by this script will start on this date regardless of timeseries starts before or after
end_year_comment: DO NOT MOD!:  year the x axis ends on.  All graphs generated by this script will end on this date regardless of timeseries ends before or after
plot_name_comment: DO NOT MOD!:  title of plot, position in array corresponds to the plot_id
models_comment: DO NOT MOD!:  models are sub component of scenarios, used as part of the file name, position corresponds to the data_key2
scenarios_comment: DO NOT MOD!:  used as suptitle of plots, position corresponds to the data_key2
CODE COMMENTS: DO NOT MOD!:  ---nothing below here should ever change without code changes---------
ARGPARSE_SECTION_Comment: DO NOT MOD!:  defines the command line arguments used by the scripts.  Do not change as will require Code changes

ARGUMENTS.help: table and database in the format of: table@database
table and database in the format of: table@database
CSV File to read data from
alternat config for columns, keys, models,scenarios
